channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 01:25 Air alert in Vinnytsia region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 游댮 01:25 Air alert in Vinnytsia region. Follow for further updates. #Vinnytsia_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 22:19 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now in Chervonogrigorivska territorial community. Take shelter!
item.description: 游댮 22:19 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now in Chervonogrigorivska territorial community. Take shelter! #햖햣쒫쮏쫧쮏햦햡쮐햦쒬혧햨햟_혝햣햦혝쮐햦햟햩혧햫햟_햡쮏쨿썛얧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
